meaningMnemonic: Your <kanji>ancestor</kanji> <kanji>father</kanji> isn't your father, it's the father that came before your father's generation, your <vocabulary>grandfather</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading is all on'yomi, which is great for 祖 but not as great for 父. To remember that this 父 is ふ, just think about how much of a <reading>foo</reading>l (ふ) your grandfather was, even if he wasn't.
